review: After literally months of not using our Verizon cable service - because too many of the channels are garbage and the better ones are only available with the highest packages, we decided to turn our cable boxes in and just stream what we want to see off the Internet.We have a media center computer to stream on our 60" HDTV, but the Fire TV box allows us to do the same thing in our basement family room.$100 gets you a month of Verizon Fios Triple Play... and $100 gets you pretty much endless months of streaming plus the yearly Prime renewal fee.  It's kind of a no-brainer.  We will not look back at crappy cable again.
